MemberSignature.Value: public XSPWorkerRequest (int requestId, Mono.WebServer.XSPRequestBroker requestBroker, Mono.WebServer.IApplicationHost appHost, System.Net.EndPoint localEP, System.Net.EndPoint remoteEP, string verb, string path, string queryString, string protocol, byte[] inputBuffer, IntPtr socket, bool secure);

Docs.param: A containing the ID of the new request as is used by .
A containing the request broker used to mannage the new instance.
A containing the application host that created the new instance.
A containing the local endpoint of the connection.
A containing the remote endpoint of the connection.
A containing the HTTP request verb used in making the request. (eg. "GET", "POST", "PUSH", ...)
A containing the path used in making the request.
A containing the query string used in making the request.
A containing the protocol used in making the request. (eg. "HTTP/1.1")
A to use when reading input from the request broker.
A containing the raw socket used for the new request.
A indicating whether or not the connection is secure.
